name: Ham Salad with a Schmear
author: badbabybeth
summary: I use this recipe when I have leftover ham. It's simple, quick, and delicious; not to mention the easy clean up! You can also add a little shredded Cheddar cheese or American cheese, if desired. Serve on sandwiches or with crackers as an appetizer.
ingredients: 3 cloves garlic, or more to taste
1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish, or to taste
1 tablespoon stone-ground mustard, or to taste
directions: Pulse ham, onion, and garlic in a food processor until finely chopped; transfer to a bowl
Place mayonnaise, cream cheese, relish, and mustard in food processor and process until smooth
Stir cream cheese mixture and ham mixture together in a bowl
